verses.verse: Now when <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> had <S%H6419>prayed,<s%> and when he had <S%H3034>confessed,<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> and casting himself <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> there <S%H6908>assembled<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him out of <S%H4480>Israel<s%> <S%H3478><s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%> and <S%H3206>children:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> very <S%H7235>sore.<s%> <S%H1059><s%>

And <S%H7935>Shechaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> one of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5830>Ezra,<s%> <S%H587>We<s%> have <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against our <S%H430>God,<s%> and have <S%H3427>taken<s%> <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> of the <S%H4480>people<s%> <S%H5971><s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> yet <S%H6258>now<s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H4723>hope<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> thing.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore let us <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with our <S%H430>God<s%> to put <S%H3318>away<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>wives,<s%> and such as are <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them, according to the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of my <S%H136>lord,<s%> and of those that <S%H2730>tremble<s%> at the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of our <S%H430>God;<s%> and let it be <S%H6213>done<s%> according to the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

Arise; <S%H6965><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> this <S%H1697>matter<s%> belongeth <S%H5921>unto<s%> thee: <S%H587>we<s%> also will be <S%H5973>with<s%> thee: be of good <S%H2388>courage,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

Then <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H5830>Ezra,<s%> and <S%H853>made<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> that they should <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word.<s%> And they <S%H7650>swore.<s%>

Then <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib:<s%> and when he <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> he did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H4604>transgression<s%> of them that had been carried <S%H1473>away.<s%>

And they made <S%H5674>proclamation<s%> <S%H6963><s%> throughout <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> that they should gather themselves <S%H6908>together<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

And that <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> according to the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7399>substance<s%> should be <S%H2763>forfeited,<s%> and <S%H1931>himself<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> from the <S%H4480>congregation<s%> <S%H6951><s%> of those that had been carried <S%H1473>away.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6908>together<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%> <S%H1931>It<s%> was the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7460>trembling<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of this <S%H1697>matter,<s%> and for the great <S%H4480>rain.<s%> <S%H1653><s%>

And <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> stood <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H859>Ye<s%> have <S%H4603>transgressed,<s%> and have <S%H3427>taken<s%> <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> to <S%H3254>increase<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H819>trespass<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H8426>confession<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H7522>pleasure:<s%> and separate <S%H914>yourselves<s%> from the <S%H4480>people<s%> <S%H5971><s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H802>wives.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> As thou hast <S%H1697>said,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> must we <S%H6213>do.<s%>

But <S%H61><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7227>many,<s%> and it is a <S%H6256>time<s%> of much <S%H1653>rain,<s%> and we are <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H3581>able<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H2351>without,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is this a <S%H4399>work<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3808>or<s%> <S%H8147>two:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> we are <S%H7235>many<s%> that have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

Let <S%H4994>now<s%> our <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> <S%H5975>stand,<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> them <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H3427>taken<s%> <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> in our <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> at <S%H2163>appointed<s%> <S%H6256>times,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> them the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of every <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H5892><s%> and the <S%H8199>judges<s%> thereof, <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%> be <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> us.

Only <S%H389><s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> and <S%H3167>Jahaziah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8616>Tikvah<s%> were <S%H5975>employed<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> matter: and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> and <S%H7678>Shabbethai<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> them.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%> And <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> with <S%H376>certain<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers,<s%> after the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> of them by their <S%H8034>names,<s%> were <S%H914>separated,<s%> and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> to <S%H1875>examine<s%> the <S%H1697>matter.<s%>

And they made an <S%H3615>end<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> that had <S%H3427>taken<s%> <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H5704>by<s%> the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

And among the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> there were <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> had <S%H3427>taken<s%> <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H802>wives:<s%> namely, of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3136>Jozadak,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren;<s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> and <S%H461>Eliezer,<s%> and <S%H3402>Jarib,<s%> and <S%H1436>Gedaliah.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> that they would put <S%H3318>away<s%> their <S%H802>wives;<s%> and being <S%H818>guilty,<s%> they offered a <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> their <S%H819>trespass.<s%>
And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H564>Immer;<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah.<s%>
And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H2766>Harim;<s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> and <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> and <S%H5818>Uzziah.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H6583>Pashur;<s%> <S%H454>Elioenai,<s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H5417>Nethaneel,<s%> <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> and <S%H501>Elasah.<s%>

Also <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%> <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> and <S%H7041>Kelaiah,<s%> (the <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H7042>Kelita,)<s%> <S%H6611>Pethahiah,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H461>Eliezer.<s%>
Of <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H7891>singers<s%> also; <S%H475>Eliashib:<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7778>porters;<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> and <S%H2928>Telem,<s%> and <S%H221>Uri.<s%>

Moreover of <S%H4480>Israel:<s%> <S%H3478><s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H6551>Parosh;<s%> <S%H7422>Ramiah,<s%> and <S%H3150>Jeziah,<s%> and <S%H4441>Malchiah,<s%> and <S%H4326>Miamin,<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H4441>Malchijah,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H5867>Elam;<s%> <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> and <S%H5660>Abdi,<s%> and <S%H3406>Jeremoth,<s%> and <S%H452>Eliah.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H2240>Zattu;<s%> <S%H454>Elioenai,<s%> <S%H475>Eliashib,<s%> <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> and <S%H3406>Jeremoth,<s%> and <S%H2066>Zabad,<s%> and <S%H5819>Aziza.<s%>
Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> also of <S%H893>Bebai;<s%> <S%H3076>Jehohanan,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H2079>Zabbai,<s%> and <S%H6270>Athlai.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H1137>Bani;<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> <S%H4409>Malluch,<s%> and <S%H5718>Adaiah,<s%> <S%H3437>Jashub,<s%> and <S%H7594>Sheal,<s%> and <S%H3406>Ramoth.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H6355>Pahath-moab;<s%> <S%H5733>Adna,<s%> and <S%H3636>Chelal,<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> <S%H1212>Bezaleel,<s%> and <S%H1131>Binnui,<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>
And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2766>Harim;<s%> <S%H461>Eliezer,<s%> <S%H3449>Ishijah,<s%> <S%H4441>Malchiah,<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> <S%H8095>Shimeon,<s%>
Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> <S%H4409>Malluch,<s%> and <S%H8114>Shemariah.<s%>

Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H2828>Hashum;<s%> <S%H4982>Mattenai,<s%> <S%H4992>Mattathah,<s%> <S%H2066>Zabad,<s%> <S%H467>Eliphelet,<s%> <S%H3413>Jeremai,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei.<s%>
Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H1137>Bani;<s%> <S%H4572>Maadai,<s%> <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> and <S%H177>Uel,<s%>
Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> <S%H912>Bedeiah,<s%> <S%H3622>Chelluh,<s%>
Vaniah, <S%H2057><s%> <S%H4822>Meremoth,<s%> <S%H475>Eliashib,<s%>
Mattaniah, <S%H4983><s%> <S%H4982>Mattenai,<s%> and <S%H3299>Jaasau,<s%>
And <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> and <S%H1131>Binnui,<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%>
And <S%H8018>Shelemiah,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and <S%H5718>Adaiah,<s%>
Machnadebai, <S%H4367><s%> <S%H8343>Shashai,<s%> <S%H8298>Sharai,<s%>
Azareel, <S%H5832><s%> and <S%H8018>Shelemiah,<s%> <S%H8114>Shemariah,<s%>
Shallum, <S%H7967><s%> <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H5015>Nebo;<s%> <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> <S%H2066>Zabad,<s%> <S%H2081>Zebina,<s%> <S%H3035>Jadau,<s%> and <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> had <S%H5375>taken<s%> <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H802>wives:<s%> and some <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H3426>had<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> by whom they <S%H7760>had<s%> <S%H1121>children.<s%>
